encounters.title: Bandit Ambush
encounters.description: Three armed bandits step out from behind rocks, weapons drawn. 'Your money or your life!' the leader shouts.

choices.outcome: You draw your weapon and fight. After a tense struggle, the bandits flee. You're bruised but victorious.
You turn and run. The bandits don't pursue - they were likely bluffing.
You offer them some rations. They accept and let you pass.

encounters.title: Wolf Pack
encounters.description: A pack of hungry wolves emerges from the undergrowth, circling you with bared fangs. Their eyes gleam with predatory intent.

choices.outcome: You make yourself appear large and shout. After a tense standoff, the wolves retreat, but not before one nips at your leg.
You toss some rations to distract them. The wolves fight over the food while you slip away.
You carefully retreat, maintaining eye contact. The wolves watch but don't pursue.

encounters.title: Snake Nest
encounters.description: You nearly step into a nest of venomous snakes! They coil and hiss, ready to strike.

choices.outcome: You leap backward just in time. One snake strikes but misses. Your heart pounds as you find another path.
You dispatch the snakes with your weapon, but one bites your ankle before dying. The venom burns.

encounters.title: Enemy Scout
encounters.description: A lone scout in dark leather armor spots you. They reach for a signal horn at their belt.

choices.outcome: You charge before they can signal. A brief struggle ensues, and you manage to knock them unconscious.
You duck behind cover and wait. The scout looks around suspiciously but eventually moves on.
You offer water in exchange for their silence. They accept with a knowing nod.

encounters.title: Traveling Merchant
encounters.description: A friendly merchant with a laden cart waves you down. 'Care to trade, friend? I have supplies aplenty!'

choices.outcome: You exchange some water for rations. A fair deal for both parties.
The merchant shares news from nearby towns and warns of bandit activity to the north. Useful information!
You politely decline and continue on your way. The merchant waves farewell.

encounters.title: Lost Traveler
encounters.description: A disheveled traveler stumbles toward you, clearly exhausted. 'Please, I've been lost for days. Do you have any water?'

choices.outcome: You share your water. The traveler weeps with gratitude and gives you a small pouch of dried meat before departing.
You point them toward the nearest settlement. They thank you profusely and hurry off.
You walk past without stopping. Their pleading eyes follow you as you leave.

encounters.title: Wise Hermit
encounters.description: An elderly hermit sits by a small fire outside a crude shelter. They look up with knowing eyes. 'Rest a while, traveler. The road is long.'

choices.outcome: You share stories and rest by the fire. The hermit shares wisdom about the land and gives you some foraged roots.
The hermit applies a poultice to your wounds. It stings but you feel better.
You nod respectfully and continue your journey. The hermit waves in farewell.

encounters.title: Abandoned Campsite
encounters.description: You stumble upon a recently abandoned camp. A still-warm fire smolders, and supplies are scattered about.

choices.outcome: You find some usable rations and a waterskin left behind. Lucky find!
A hasty search yields a single ration. Better than nothing.
You decide not to disturb the camp and move on. Someone might return for their belongings.

encounters.title: Hidden Spring
encounters.description: You discover a crystal-clear spring bubbling up from the rocks, hidden among the vegetation.

choices.outcome: You fill your containers with the fresh, cold water. It's incredibly refreshing!
You drink deeply and rest by the spring. Your body feels rejuvenated.

encounters.title: Supply Cache
encounters.description: Partially hidden by brush, you spot a weathered crate marked with faded symbols. Someone's hidden supplies!

choices.outcome: Inside you find preserved rations, water, and medical supplies. A treasure trove!
You take only what you need, leaving the rest for other travelers.

encounters.title: Dust Storm
encounters.description: Dark clouds of dust roll in from the horizon. A fierce storm is about to hit!

choices.outcome: You hunker down and wait out the storm. It passes after a few hours.
You press on through the storm. The wind and sand batter you, causing injuries and costing precious water.

encounters.title: Flash Flood
encounters.description: Water rushes down the canyon with terrifying speed! A flash flood is upon you!

choices.outcome: You scramble to higher ground just in time. The water roars past below you.
The water slams into you, dragging you downstream. You manage to grab a rock and pull yourself out, battered and missing supplies.

encounters.title: Scorching Heat
encounters.description: The sun beats down mercilessly. The heat is becoming unbearable, and you feel yourself weakening.

choices.outcome: You find meager shade and wait for the worst of the heat to pass.
You drink deeply to stay hydrated and press on through the heat.
You push through despite the heat. Your body suffers for it.

encounters.title: Dense Fog
encounters.description: A thick fog rolls in, reducing visibility to mere feet. You can barely see your hand in front of your face.

choices.outcome: You stop and wait for the fog to lift. Eventually visibility improves.
You proceed slowly and carefully. It takes extra time but you make progress.
You stride forward confidently... and walk straight into a thornbush.
